snippet: The New Jersey Symphony Orchestra, led by Jacques Lacombe, opened it second winter festival, called Fire, with a work by Alexander Scriabin.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews performance by the New Jersey Symphony Orchestra at the New Jersey Performing Arts Center.
lead_paragraph: The New Jersey Symphony Orchestra, led by Jacques Lacombe, opened it second winter festival, called Fire, with a work by Alexander Scriabin.

headline.seo: New Jersey Symphony Orchestra in Newark - Review
headline.main: All the Colors of a Scriabin Rarity That’s Meant to Be Seen as Well as Heard
headline.print_headline: All the Colors of a Scriabin Rarity That’s Meant to Be Seen as Well as Heard
